sun.name: Sun
sun.description: Our star, a yellow dwarf star that provides light and energy to the solar system.

planets.name: Mercury
planets.description: The smallest and innermost planet in the Solar System.

planets.name: Venus
planets.description: The second planet from the Sun, often called Earth's sister planet.

planets.name: Earth
planets.description: Our home planet, the third planet from the Sun and the only known planet with life.

planets.name: Mars
planets.description: The fourth planet from the Sun, known as the Red Planet.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.description: The largest planet in the Solar System, a gas giant.

planets.name: Saturn
planets.description: The sixth planet from the Sun, famous for its spectacular ring system.

planets.name: Uranus
planets.description: The seventh planet from the Sun, an ice giant with a tilted axis.

planets.name: Neptune
planets.description: The eighth and farthest known planet from the Sun, an ice giant.

nearby_stars.name: Alpha Centauri
nearby_stars.description: The closest star system to our Sun, consisting of three stars.

nearby_stars.name: Barnard's Star
nearby_stars.description: A red dwarf star, one of the nearest stars to the Sun.

nearby_stars.name: Sirius
nearby_stars.description: The brightest star in Earth's night sky, a binary star system.
